definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Adhering technical innovation and popularization of science is the only way to make enterprise powerful.
sentences.chinese: 堅持科技創新和科學普及是企業發展壯大的必由之路。

sentences.english: To develope the scientific study and scientific popularization of the forest park.
sentences.chinese: 積極開展森林公園的科學研究和科學普及工作。

sentences.english: Another would be to revise the approach to science communication and popularisation.
sentences.chinese: 另外一個問題是要改善科學傳播與科學普及的方法。

sentences.english: Mass media is a dominant means of science popularization.
sentences.chinese: 大衆傳媒是科學普及的一個主要途徑。

sentences.english: Scientific popularization is one of the basic outlets of solvingabove-mentioned problems.
sentences.chinese: 科學普及是解決上述問題的根本出路之一。

sentences.english: He also inspired me in the area of popularizing science.
sentences.chinese: 在科學普及的領域他也啓發了我。
